attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Truly deserved of the title "National Treasure",there a few figures of stage and screen as iconic as Brian.Instantly recognizable by voice or visage,Brian is held in great affection by the British public,not just for his enormous contribution to entertainment,but for his humour,character and indomitable spirit of adventure.Among his many exploits,Brian remains the oldest man to trek (on foot) to the magnetic North Pole and reach the dizzy altitude of 28,000ft of Everest without oxygen.From a humble mining background,Brian is also a tireless charity and ecological campaigner.He deserves no less than to be known as Sir Brian Blessed.
